messages.content: You need to judge whether there is Stiction by the image. The image has PV(blue line) and OP(orange line) on the y-axis and time on the x-axis. PV stands for process variable and OP stands for controller output. The typical feature of Stiction is that the change of PV lags behind that of OP.
<image>This is PV&OP-t graph. Is there stiction?
Yes, there is stiction in this control loop.
